snippet.title: CONFINED: Leaving OKB-134 | Announcement Trailer | PC and VR | Extended Version 3
snippet.description:
CONFINED: Leaving OKB-134 is a first-person Survival-Horror game for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. Seek safety by reactivating power, lights and machinery. Learn about long gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.

DEMO OUT NOW:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3195810/CONFINED_Leaving_OKB134_Demo/

Coming Spring 2025
https://www.fiend-games.com/

Wishlist Now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2816730/CONFINED_Leaving_OKB134/

Extended Version Trailer | Watch Short Version Here:
https://youtu.be/_saVXho5_8U?si=uU3Gpolg3d5pXTHq
